page.title: 08KEMBLE ESTATE
page.content: "S.J. Phillips and Sons" is an estate in{Kemble}covering 2000 acres. The main offices are in{Kemble }village and all the tractors and machinery are kept in a big shed near to the workshop. There is a grain store and mill in the farmyard. There are three dairy farms, one of which is near {Smerrill.}There are 21 people working there and they have 5 loose boxes where the cows sleep and feed. They have 240 cows on this farm. There is a second dairy farm on the estate with 240 cows, and a third with calves only. They have no pigs, but they have lots and lots of sheep which only come out in the early winter time.
